titleStmt.title: Certaine Psalmes of Dauid, heretofore much out of vse because of their difficult tunes. The nomber whereof are contained in the page following. Reduced into English meter better fitting the common tunes. By H.D.
titleStmt.author: Dod, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings most excellent maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and Dod's full name from STC.
At foot of title: Cum Priuilegio Regiae Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
